about_the_game:
The artbook for Heretic’s Fork - your visual journey through the Underworld. Find character designs and environment illustrations that showcase the infernal art style. The art book also includes behind-the-scenes and early concepts, providing insight into the creative process behind the game’s visuals.
The artbook would is filled with dark and twisted imagery, reflecting the game’s theme of punishment and retribution. Visit 9 circles of Hell and get familiar with its demons, who overwork to punish as many sinners as possible and become the best employee of the month.

You can find your 9 Circles of Art in Steam\steamapps\common\Heretic's Fork\
